product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaEaze Drop Blur + Smooth Foundation Stick
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeEaze Drop Blur + Smooth Foundation Stick by FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna - that natural-skin flex- fast. This light coverage, longwear formula melts effortlessly for a second-skin, natural finish. The creamy, smooth texture instantly blurs- just swipe, blend, and let 'em wonder what your secret is.
details: DetailsBenefitsA smooth, instant-blurring skin foundation stick that's so easy you can't f it up. The creamy, crease-proof formula glides on seamlessly for light coverage that lets skin look like skinLongwear, light buildable coverage that resists fading and transferringEasy-to-use foundation stick that you can apply anywhere, anytime—no tools requiredMurumuru butter melts into skin and helps provide all day hydrationQuickBlur complex delivers a blurred & smooth, second-skin finishSodium hyaluronate helps provide hydrationColor true pigments - helps resist oxidation100% recyclable packaging–twist the stick 'til it's empty and toss directly in the recycle bin, no rinsing or scraping requiredItem 2614177How To UseWANT LIGHT COVERAGE?• Apply directly on the skin across cheeks, forehead, chin, & nose• Blend with fingers or Full-Bodied Foundation Brush 110Pro Tip: For extra blurring benefit, press into skin with Precision Makeup Sponge 100WANT TO BUILD A 'LIL MORE COVERAGE?• Load product directly onto Full-Bodied Foundation Brush 110• Press + blend where neededThe more pressure you apply when you swipe, the more coverage you get.Looking for even more coverage? Try Eaze Drop Blurring Skin Tint.Always remove the cap and cover before twisting up the stick and replace cap after each use.HOW TO RECYCLE: When the stick gets low, keep twisting to push out the remaining formula.Once empty, toss the whole thing in the recycling bin---no rinsing or scraping required.IngredientsDimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Psidium Guajava Fruit Extract, Tocopherol. [+/-] May Contain/Peut Contenir : Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: WANT LIGHT COVERAGE?• Apply directly on the skin across cheeks, forehead, chin, & nose• Blend with fingers or Full-Bodied Foundation Brush 110Pro Tip: For extra blurring benefit, press into skin with Precision Makeup Sponge 100WANT TO BUILD A 'LIL MORE COVERAGE?• Load product directly onto Full-Bodied Foundation Brush 110• Press + blend where neededThe more pressure you apply when you swipe, the more coverage you get.Looking for even more coverage? Try Eaze Drop Blurring Skin Tint.Always remove the cap and cover before twisting up the stick and replace cap after each use.HOW TO RECYCLE: When the stick gets low, keep twisting to push out the remaining formula.Once empty, toss the whole thing in the recycling bin---no rinsing or scraping required.

reviews.headline: Good if ur looking for something glowy
reviews.comments: I was looking for a skin tint that wouldnt leave me looking greasy, was recommended this, and it didnt go as planned. This left me very oily, i would have to put on a lot of setting powder throughout the day which was the whole point that i didnt want to have to do that. It also was a bit patchy under my eyes and by my nose and cheeks but that could have been something with my skin. If youre looking for something more less-coverage and not glowy, this isnt for you

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This foundation stick is truly the best! It goes on smoothly and can be used just a little for a light makeup natural look or for a full-on glam look. It blends perfectly and doesn't crease. I'm on the older side and some makeup seems to fill my wrinkles and highlight them and this does not do that. It really is one of the best foundation choices I've used so far, and you can build on it if you want more coverage. I even use it to even out my skin when I don't want to wear any other makeup. It is my newest favorite as are most of the Fenty products.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: The color match is perfect and the ease in applying and the coverage are excellent.

reviews.headline: MAC replacement
reviews.comments: MAC messed up when they changed their colors, because this is what I replaced it with and I like it better! No irritation on my sensitive skin. I can't feel it, and actually forgot to wash it off one night.. no acne or irritation the next morning.  No dryness

reviews.headline: Genuine review
reviews.comments: Does not wear well regardless of the type of primer or setting powder I used. It didn't last more than 2 hours. This is genuinely the worst product I've used in a while. I wanted to like it so much but it just wore terribly. Product was silky and smooth

reviews.headline: Perfect Skin Tint
reviews.comments: I use this when I travel. It has great coverage and melts beautifully into my skin. I have VERY textured, mature, combo/oily skin, and it looks amazing. I use a dry sponge to spread it, dust on powder and it lasts all day.

reviews.headline: I buy it again
reviews.comments: I love it look so natural

reviews.headline: Beautiful light coverage
reviews.comments: I did not realize this was more of a skin tint when I bought it, works wonderfully nevertheless! I usually gravitate towards foundation sticks because they're workable and clean to use, and this product is exactly that. Easy to apply and get light-to-medium coverage. If you are looking for full coverage, THIS IS NOT THE PRODUCT. However, I do love using this product in the summer because it feels comfortable on the skin!

reviews.headline: Love! Love!  Love!
reviews.comments: I have been using this foundation since it came out.  I LOVE it.  It gives a nice natural look.  I receive so many compliments stating that my skin is so smooth and beautiful.  I also use Fenty skin care so it could be a combination of great skin care products (which is most important), and a great foundation stick.

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this product!!!!
reviews.comments: At my age (56 y/o), I've tried all kinds of foundations, many brands, but this is the best ever! First with so many shades, I was pleased to find my perfect shade, I get so many compliments on how pretty my skin is. Second, it goes on smooth, blends easily, and doesn't smudge after it's set. The only problem I have—finding my shade in stock in stores, I suppose it's very common. I do recommend it to everyone who asks.

reviews.headline: Smooth
reviews.comments: Not used to a stick version, but I do like it. Goes on smooth, probably could have matched my color better, but it is perfect for the current tone of my skin right now. Perfect coverage without it looking like I am wearing layers of product!

reviews.headline: I wish I loved this
reviews.comments: I bought this product when I was looking for a light, everyday foundation. Although it checked both of these wants off of my list, I would not recommend this product if you have oily, textured skin like I do. I found the product is light and easy to apply, but accentuates all of the texture and pores on my face. I've also noticed the product slips around my oily skin after just a few hours of wear. Unfortunately I wouldn't reccomend if you have oily, textured skin.

reviews.headline: AMAZING, my ride or die
reviews.comments: I HATE how foundation feels on my skin and when it looks cakey. But this one doesnt feel heavy at all and looks sooooo natural. Only foundation I use

reviews.headline: I wasn't crazy about
reviews.comments: It's a very light foundation and powder

reviews.headline: Good coverage, but too oily for me.
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product. It was good coverage and a great color match. Unfortunately after a few hours it made my skin so, so oily. It was like being a teenager again.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: It matches my skin tone perfectly and doesn't look like have anything on

reviews.headline: I will always by this
reviews.comments: I love the way it looks on me natural, compliments, my skin

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comments: I've been struggling finding a foundation ghst sctually sits on my skin beautifully without creasing or gettinf patchy and this is it! My skin goes through changes constantly with weather and such and this works well in winter and summer! It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin and it covers my butterfly radh from lupus! I love it so much! I have combination skin and it works fantastic for me!

reviews.headline: So moisturizing!
reviews.comments: It is so smooth on the face it's wild! I love that there are so many color options being that I need a pretty specific color for my face. It lasts all day and works very well with products over top of it. I haven't tried building the coverage but I'm sure it would do great!

reviews.headline: Natural Flawless Finish
reviews.comments: If you're looking for a natural and flawless finish, look no further.  Goes on soft and smooth.  Great shade selections, which is always appreciated.  Reasonably priced.  My go to stick foundation.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently had the opportunity to try out the Fenty Beauty Eaze Drop Stick Blur + Smooth Tint Foundation, courtesy of a free sample from Fenty Beauty as a Buzz feed agent in exchange for an honest review. From the moment I received the product, I was impressed by its packaging – a sleek and beautifully designed stick that elegantly resembles a lipstick.

One of the standout features of this foundation is its remarkable durability. I put it to the test during an intense workout session, and I was pleasantly surprised to find that the product stayed intact, without smudging or streaking. This is a game-changer for those of us who are constantly on the move and need a foundation that can keep up with our active lifestyles.

The foundation lives up to its name by effortlessly blending onto the skin. Upon application, it seamlessly blurs imperfections and provides a smooth and even tint that enhances my natural complexion. This aspect of the product truly shines, allowing for a natural and radiant finish that doesn't feel heavy or cakey.

As a fan of Rihanna's commitment to inclusivity, I was pleased to discover that the Fenty Beauty Eaze Drop Stick Foundation offers a range of shades that cater to a diverse array of skin tones. This inclusivity adds to the product's appeal, ensuring that everyone can find their perfect match.
In conclusion, the Fenty Beauty Eaze Drop Stick Blur + Smooth Tint Foundation has left a positive impression on me. Not only is the packaging visually appealing, but the product's performance also speaks for itself. Its ability to stay put during a workout and its seamless blending properties make it a standout choice in the world of foundations. If you're in search of a reliable and versatile foundation, this one is definitely worth considering.
faceoff_positive.headline: Game changer, Effortless Beauty

faceoff_negative.comments: If you're young with better pores, this would great. My skin is still pretty great for 31 as I take serious care of it, however due to the nature of this product. It doesn't look amazing in my skin but I've seen worse too. It's actually pretty thin when it spreads on and I can't imagine how it could actually blur for anyone, even young with small pores. There might be reviews saying it does blue but I really believe they are the exception not the average. However, I do enjoy this a bit under my eyes. When I go to work I don't have a full face, just spf mixed with the dermablend pigment drops (I don't advise mixing spf with anything because that changes the chemical composition and dilutes the spf, but these specific drops actually emhanse protection so say studies and dermatologist I trust)then a but if xrewm/liquid blush on my fave and eyes, lips sometimes. If I've had a particularly long night I use this product a bug under my eyes (the lightest shade us actually more fair than the name of light, moreso than you would think for the small shade range which is another issue. Anyway, a bit tapped around where concealer goes (the corner and our side corner, the trend now I guess) looks super brightening without looking crazy. As of now, I wouldn't purchase it again but I'm glad I have it. If I finish the product and find im sad it's fine, obviously I would purchase another and change my reviews, ha, but I don't think it's that amazing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Okay, worth a shot especially if you're younger w/ good skin
